revision.text:
Kanto es la primera región en el mundo de Pokeclicker donde le jugador empieza el juego. La Pokédex de esta región contiene un total de 151 Pokémon desde Bulbasaur #001 hasta Mew #151. Exclusivamente en esta región, ciertos Pokémon solo se pueden encontrar en la [[Zona Safari]]. [[File:Kanto Town Map 0.8.3.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Kanto region]]

==Flow Chart Walkthrough== [[File:Kanto_Flow_Chart_0.8.2_Updated.png|500px]]
*The Dock is unlocked after the completion of the Kanto Pokédex
*Route 5 is located South of Cerulean City *Pokémon Tower is located in Lavender Town *Route 21 is located South of Pallet Town *Viridian City Gym is Located in Viridian City
*Either Route 15 or 18 unlocks Fuchsia City *Either Route 20 or 21 Unlocks Cinnabar Island
*The Thunder (Vermillion City Gym) and Marsh (Saffron City Gym) Badges do not need to be obtained to progress through most of the region. It is only necessary to obtain the Thunder and Marsh Badges to unlock the Viridian City Gym. *Route 22 must be completed to access Route 23
